name: Combined Defence Service Examination (CDSE) - Indian Army

details.status: Applications rejected due to non-payment of fee.
rejection_reasons: non-payment of fee through cash mode
non-payment of fee through debit/credit cards or internet banking
details.appeal_procedure: Appeals can be made along with documentary evidence sent to the Commission by speed post OR by hand only.

details.Sessions: 09:00 AM to 11:00 AM (English Paper), 12:00 Noon to 02:00 PM (General Knowledge Paper) and 03:00 PM to 05:00 PM (Elementary Mathematics Paper)
details.Venue Entry Closure: 30 minutes prior to the commencement of the Examination in each Session.
details.Banned Items: Candidates are not allowed to enter the examination premises with any valuables/costly items, mobile phones, smart/digital watches, other IT gadgets, books, bags etc.
details.Disciplinary Action: Possession/use of mobile phones (even in switch off mode) and other electronic/communication devices or any other incriminating material shall entail disciplinary action which may include cancellation of candidature of candidate, filing of FIR/police complaint against the candidate, prohibition from appearing in subsequent session(s) of the examination.
details.Representation Portal: https://upsconline.nic.in/miscellaneous/QPRep/ during the period from 22.4 April, 2024 to - 28t April, 2024 (till 06:00 pm).
